verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w dedication|strong="H2598"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*. \w Of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w I|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* exalt \w You|strong="H1004"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w You|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1004"\w* \w lifted|strong="H1732"\w* \w me|strong="H1004"\w* up \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* allowed \w my|strong="H1732"\w* foes \w to|strong="H1004"\w* rejoice \w over|strong="H1732"\w* \w me|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* cried \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* help, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* healed \w me|strong="H7311"\w*.
\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, You pulled me up \w from|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol; You spared me \w from|strong="H3068"\w* descending into \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Pit.

Sing \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* saints, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* praise \w His|strong="H3068"\w* holy name.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3068"\w* fleeting, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w favor|strong="H3068"\w* lasts \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lifetime. Weeping \w may|strong="H3068"\w* stay \w the|strong="H3068"\w* night, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* joy comes \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* morning.
\w In|strong="H3885"\w* prosperity \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7522"\w* never \w be|strong="H2416"\w* shaken.”

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w You|strong="H5769"\w* favored \w me|strong="H5769"\w*; \w You|strong="H5769"\w* made my mountain stand strong. When \w You|strong="H5769"\w* hid \w Your|strong="H5769"\w* face, \w I|strong="H7959"\w* was dismayed.

\w To|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H6440"\w* called, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* begged \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*:

“What gain \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bloodshed, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* descent \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Pit? \w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dust praise \w You|strong="H7121"\w*? \w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness?

\w Hear|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* have mercy; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w be|strong="H1818"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* helper.”

\w You|strong="H8085"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* mourning \w into|strong="H1961"\w* dancing; \w You|strong="H8085"\w* peeled off \w my|strong="H8085"\w* sackcloth \w and|strong="H3068"\w* clothed \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* joy,

that \w my|strong="H6605"\w* heart may sing \w Your|strong="H6605"\w* praises \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w not|strong="H6605"\w* be silent. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H6605"\w* God, I will \w give|strong="H2015"\w* thanks forever.
